name: Earn the Name Back For Shadow Puppets
name_original: Earn the Name Back For Shadow Puppets
description:
这是一款设计灵感源自银河战士恶魔城品类的横版战斗闯关游戏。

因为皮影的表演需要利用悬挂的灯，在中文中被称为“悬灯”（中文读作 Xuán Dēng），而在中国清朝末年试图造反的白莲教晚上会挂灯集会，被称为“ 玄灯”（中文读作 Xuán Dēng）。皮影的悬灯因为和白莲的玄灯同名而遭误解打压。

玩家将扮演受“皮影悬灯”之托的皮影，一路探索击敌，最终打败“白莲玄灯”，为皮影正名。

This is a 2D action game with a design inspired by the Metroidvania genre.  

Because the performance of shadow puppets needs to use hanging lamps, it is called "hanging lantern" (pronounced Xuán Dēng in Chinese). The cult White Lotus, which tried to rebel at the end of the Qing Dynasty in China, would hang lantern for gatherings at night, be called cult lantern (also pronounced Xuán Dēng in Chinese). Shadow puppet's hanging lantern was misunderstood and suppressed because it had the same pronunciation as White Lotus's lantern.  

Players will play a shadow puppet entrusted by the "Lantern of Shadow Puppet", explore and attack the enemy along the way, and finally defeat the "Lantern of White Lotus" to earn the name back for the shadow puppets.
